website_summaries.verdict: Has a lot to offer for a reasonable price with features that meet the needs of novice and entry level photographers and videographers.
pros: Offers excellent lighting that's suitable for amateurs and hobbyists on a budget
Stands are fairly sturdy and easy to set up and take down
cons: A few consumers griped of burnt out bulbs or missing parts upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for a Great price....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller! great product for a great price - if you are wanting super professional this might not be what you are looking for however it is a GREAT starter kit and perfect for lighting beginners! Pros that want to take it to go this is an excellent option as well! I could't be happier with this purchase! I am a prop photog and just getting into the studio lighting scene (most of my work is on location using natural light
customer_reviews.author: hollyvenus

customer_reviews.title: the quality is great. Kit included all parts and there was no ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit because I was taking an introductory photography class and wanted to take some studio portraits. It is worth the money. My advice is to buy the extra muslin clamps if you want to be able to fully stretch/secure the backdrops. If you want every last wrinkle out of the back drop you will need to use a hand held steamer. Overall, the quality is great. Kit included all parts and there was no mystery dust.
customer_reviews.author: J. Drees

customer_reviews.title: SO DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The backdrops are very cheap and get snags and runs in them easily. When putting them on the stand, they don't even come close to being the right size for the stand. Also, the stand is extremely hard to get stable enough that it doesn't sway back and forth everytime it is touched. The lights cause all my photos to look washed out and the colors don't look right. Very disappointed. I work hard for my money and this was an investment to help increase revenue, and sadly it turned out to be a loss.
customer_reviews.author: Ltaran

customer_reviews.title: Beware quality of bulbs and width of backdrops.
customer_reviews.text: Cons first: One of the CFL bulbs came apart after a couple weeks of using the product. Also, if you are using this for a green screen (not just a portrait backdrop), know that you will need to rig up some additional clamps to pull the backdrop tight as the backdrops are not the full width of the frame. Also, I tried reaching to this vendor about the bulb and have heard nothing. Pros: Sturdy, good quality pieces (except the bulbs).
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am not a pro so I can only give a beginner opinion but these were super easy to set up, look great, and do a wonderful job of lighting my room-so much so that I am currently only using two of the four lights. I am filming and haven't begun taking pictures yet, but for a novice, these are really great and I keep getting compliments on the way they look and work. Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great Light Studio
customer_reviews.text: The product is a great value. I bought it to photograph my daughter's paintings. It is easy to set up. When I was setting it up one of the lights didn't work at first. I emailed the company and they answered back within a few minutes with a quick adjustment that I could easily do and it worked right away. I would not hesitate to order from the company again. I am pleased with the product and the everything fits inside the carrying bag and is very easy to assemble. I see no reason why it wouldn't last for years. I am very happy with the product and the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the product for its price point
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the product for its price point. I'd suggest having a place to keep it set up as set-up and take-down are a bit time consuming. Only complaint is that the carrying case loads from the side, so if you have it lying flat with the opening up, once you zip it and grab the handles it turns to the side and makes a bit of a mess in the bag with how you may have organized it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Charron

customer_reviews.title: Great product - should have bought this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Works great for indoor photography! I had a problem with the 4 horizontal poles that support the background cloth as they would not slide together at all. I had my husband try and he couldn't get them in, then had my 31 year old son, an active MARINE, try and he couldn't either, so I know it wasn't me. I contacted the company and they immediately sent me new poles, which I have no trouble connecting. Very happy with the customer service and the product. I would recommend buying this, and also buying the extra clamps.
customer_reviews.author: Barb in MichiganTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Issues
customer_reviews.text: Several of the items are great - the stands are pretty impressive considering the price of the kit. Overall, the value is high. But one of the softbox light fixtures did not power the light bulb (I checked the bulb - it works in the other fixture). The seller won't answer my emails so I'm forced to use this venue to get their attention. Sorry everyone. I would purchase this again only if I knew that there was decent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: To Return or Not?
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased the Kit is finally mine. What blows is that it is a lot for one bag. I unzip the back to realized the stitched lining has come undone. So travel will become a challenge real quick. I'd like a new bag for the kit, but to return the entire Kit would be a bummer. I am still looking to completely set up the Kit, which I haven't, so come what may I will make it work. Just the damn bag. So far. So, I'm hoping the company reaches out to me to resolve the matter. If so, this review changes for the better. If not, it speaks to KimOutlet's view of customer service in the digital age.
customer_reviews.author: John Bullzye

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit for starting videographers!! Great quality for price!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit for videographers starting out!! Great quality backdrops -- green screen is very easy to use chroma keyer to remove background... the stands are all fit for the lighting equipment -- certainly can set to optimal height in any home studio, and they create a nice, bright or natural lighting effect that you would desire! Have my own camera stand by Manfrotto (which is excellent!) but I'm sure the stand that comes with it would work just fine too for indoors! Only additional recommendation is that I did buy the five extra large backdrop clamps to hold up backdrop, as the ones that come with the kit are a bit smaller... Highly recommend this set!! ALSO, EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!
customer_reviews.author: Cas Kowalewski

customer_reviews.title: Beware: likely to break after 30 day warranty and seller will not send replacements.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this kit and I would like to give it a 5 star review. However, the ribs on the umbrellas are very poor quality and started breaking after about a month. I contacted the seller, who refused to send replacements, citing their 30 day warranty. I just want to warn any potential buyers to be aware that there is a high likelihood that these pieces will break and the seller will not stand behind their product after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product for the price you pay, but don't expect much. Mine came with one bad lightbulb, and one of the crossbars for the backdrop was damaged and unusable (still waiting on a response from the seller on those items). Also, the backdrops included are NOWHERE CLOSE to the width of the frame. Even with only one crossbar in place, there is simply no way to stretch the backdrop properly with what is included in the package. The lights are decently bright, for the price. Again, you're going to get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Heather

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Parts!! Quality Control Issues
customer_reviews.text: Curtain top bar setup was bent! Missing pieces for the top bar! Damaged bottom of stands! Soft box end places holder damaged, completely ripped through! Quality control issues!!!! I dont know if others are having this problem but this is ridiculous! Also there was little protection for the parts in the packaging. Just cardboard boxes on the inside. No foam or anything. To be fair everything does turn on and just the top bar is missing which makes my curtain setup look bad. Still, for $169 was expecting more! I will be contacting the seller and am expecting a top bar replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Bain

customer_reviews.title: One MAJOR issue
customer_reviews.text: Just now received and had the setting up experience today. I was a little disappointed: - The package came with no receipt - There was no manual or instructions. Looked for them on the website and could not find it But the BIGGEST issue so far is the backdrop. The width is less than half the size of the width of the stand. There is a huge GAP between the sheet and the metal bar making the clamps useless, meaning, I couldnt stretch the sheet to look good enough for pictures. I am still giving it a 3 star since the equipment in general is of good quality and I can easily replace the backdrop.
customer_reviews.author: RQL

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner setup!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting studio lights for many years now and finally broke down and got this set. So glad I have them now! I am pleased with the quality for the price. The stands could be sturdier and clips could be more adjustable, but overall I am happy with the whole setup. I foresee using this for quite a while and then augmenting/replacing as needed.
customer_reviews.author: CLPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Parts
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked good when I opened the package. When I went to assemble the backdrop, one of the background stand had a bar that was the wrong size (top bar with wing nut that supports the backdrop was too small). I was unable to set up the Backdrop...please check your order on receipt to be sure that all components were included and the proper sizes. It doesn't appear that this company has any quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Krush One

customer_reviews.title: ... to do "professional" headshots for coworkers and it's been great. Very easy to set up and the lighting ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to do "professional" headshots for coworkers and it's been great. Very easy to set up and the lighting is nice a bright.
customer_reviews.author: JNL

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the setup and the completeness of the kit
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the setup and the completeness of the kit. Easy to set up, a quick steam of the back drop and then on to picture taking. For me, the set up will not be moving, so the durability of the parts was not a factor, however, they do seem sturdy enough to last for a while. Due to other reviewers comments about the green cloth and the lint problem, I've kept that wrapped in its original plastic - thanks to everyone for the warning on that :) Last, happy with the kit, that it has everything needed, and has a carry/storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M.

customer_reviews.title: It's good cloth, good color.
customer_reviews.text: For the price point, not a bad setup for the money. You may have trouble getting accompanying lights to effectively light the green muslin for trouble fee chroma keying in video. Really helps the light to diffuse evenly if you make the backdrop as uniform (flat) as possible. Consider dropping a connector from the cross bar, which leaves it more like 8' wide. This makes it a little easier to bungee and use drape clip to stretch the 6' wide muslin to the vertical supports. Or later you could invest in a 10' wide muslin cloth, and use the one that comes with this kit for covering stools are whatever.
customer_reviews.author: LeperSmurf

customer_reviews.title: A good setup for the price
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived in a nice little case. One of the four lights was inoperative and was immediately replace without a problem. Would have liked a little more direction about how to set this up but, it was not hard to figure out. The backdrop frame is quite large so expect to leave a section or two out for most situations. The lights seem pretty well balanced color wise. Checked them with my color balance system and the changes were minimal. Overall, I think I have a good system
customer_reviews.author: Fred H

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter kit! Loved how everything came in one carry bag. Stands are light so would not recommend for outside use without using sandbags. The lights are ok as long as you know how to use your camera to adjust. I will be ordering brighter light kit just so I can more evenly light up the green screen better. Would recommend better packing for the stands. The boxes they came in protected the stands in shipping but are worthless for using now. Looking to get like shipping tubes to keep them in when they are in bag.
customer_reviews.author: jabish

customer_reviews.title: The studio light kit was a very good entry level set up
customer_reviews.text: The studio light kit was a very good entry level set up. We've had fun taking family portraits and although I am just a hack at photography this set-up made me feel like a pro. The items are well made, easy to use and I think make the pictures have a pro look to them. I am very happy with this product and would have given 5 stars except 2 of the bulbs didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: GDT2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 100 % recommended. I love it! I do not really like to write comments but when I buy I prefer products with really good feedback, so I think this deserves to be recommended. I decided to update my "LimoStudio Photo Video Studio Light Kit " comment because I have finally used every component of my kit and it is great and super easy to put together, I use them to take photos of the products in my store and I am totally satisfied. With a very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Ivelisse Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this set
customer_reviews.text: Great product for starters. I could tell a little dust coming of the screen but, nothing significant, no mess anywhere. Material is good. Only thing is the screen only covers half of the frame provided. The four stands and lighting is just a great deal you can't beat. I can buy another set like this and there will be more lighting and double the screen!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis H

customer_reviews.title: Just what this enthusiast needed.
customer_reviews.text: This is not-heavy-duty gear, but it covers all my needs as an amateur for a complete and very portable lighting and backdrop set. The very reasonable price was concern as photo gear is rarely inexpensive, but this set turned out to be all of good quality and I am very satisfied. One of the bulbs arrived shattered, but a quick call had a replacement in my hands in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: NY2NC Transplant

customer_reviews.title: Great but for the money
customer_reviews.text: The order was damages in shipping a missing a few parts, but the customer service has been prompt(via email) and seems to be willing to take care of the problem. The products that werent damaged or lost in shipping seem nice enough for a beginner or a nice mobile studio, light sockets are plastic, but the stands will easily accept any of the hight end fixtures. Havent recieved the backdrop kit yet, but if it the same quality as the light stands i would say its a good buy for the cost. Hell i paid more for 1 high high end soft box socket and stand yet you would be hard pressed to tell the difference in a long run.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton Whitten

customer_reviews.title: 6' backdrops with a 10' frame?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Cloth does NOT match the frame width or height. The frame is 10ft wide, which is the reason I bought this kit, but the back drops are 6' wide What the heck is the point of having a 10' frame with only 6' backdrops???? I bought this kit so I could photograph my motorcycles for sale listings. This set proved completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scheiterlein

customer_reviews.title: I got the kit for Christmas and just got around ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the kit for Christmas and just got around to using it only to discover one of the softbox lights is not functioning. Everything in the kit is decent for a beginner but I don't have high hope for any of it standing up for long. Especially considering one is already not working.
customer_reviews.author: vansanchez

customer_reviews.title: We have used this twice so far and it's great. After reading all the reviews before buying
customer_reviews.text: We have used this twice so far and it's great. After reading all the reviews before buying, I found most of the negative comments were not present with our purchase. For the price it's a great value. Sturdy enough for basic use. Easy setup and tear down. Plenty of light. The black and white backdrops do have some lint, but not anywhere near as excessive as some reviews I read. One wash should take care of it. I think most negative feedback has been addressed by the seller and fixed. A worthy purchase for basic shooting. My son has enjoyed using it for growing interest in photography.
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Bag is torn on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The equipment seems to work fine on first try but the bag is torn at the seam and only going to get worse with the weight of the equipment. Considering returning it if the bag cannot be replaced as its critical to portability of the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Airborne2

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. I was looking for something to use as my first lighting set, and went with this based on other reviews and the pricing was great for all that you get. It's very easy to put together and to take a part, and comes with a bag to carry it all in. I don't think the bag is the most durable, as the zipper has broken on it already, but the other items are great. Have used it for a variety of purposes: photo shoots, my husband's selling business, etc. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Soriano

customer_reviews.title: Good product with known soft light socket problem that is easily fixable by customer:see link
customer_reviews.text: This is a good setup for the money though photos may take some post processing to get them professional quality. Directions enclosed in package are very minimal and it was necessary for me to look elsewhere online for more detailed setup instruction. One of my soft lights did not work. I contacted company and they promptly sent me a You Tube link to help me fix the "very common problem" with the soft lights. I will save you the trouble if you have ordered this and one or both soft lights are not working: [...]
customer_reviews.author: leslie cooper

customer_reviews.title: This was my first set and have really enjoyed shooting the videos and then editing them in Adobe ...
customer_reviews.text: The set allows me to do most projects whether big or small. I had a problem with one of the tripods, and the customer service representative responded quickly and rushed me a replacement tripod, at no charge. I didn't have to make any specials trips to return the damaged tripod because I was instructed to discard it. This was my first set and have really enjoyed shooting the videos and then editing them in Adobe Premiere.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: I love the limostudio kit for the price you cant ask for more. Only I recommend is buy other bulb lights with more power if you are going to use that like the unique resource of light and is very light weight easy to set. The seller is excellent I ask for a exchange one soft box because dint turn on and they send me a new one in no time, they dont ask or doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: I was under the impression that the background would feel like film paper
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, I was under the impression that the background would feel like film paper, not a thin bed sheet. I wish the backdrops were a bit more professional, but it is a start for early film and photography practice.
customer_reviews.author: dajia T

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set and price
customer_reviews.text: Love the price and almost everything in this kit. The top cross bar is a bit fickle and tight to put together the first few times I used it, but it has gotten better with use (pretty sure its due to the powder coating on the parts). The umbrellas have pretty much ZERO selectivity inside them, but in all great starter set for the price, and easily up gradable as needed.
customer_reviews.author: 95camaro

customer_reviews.title: Very professional set up at apprentice pricing
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old son ordered this and I must say I was supremely impressed with this kit. It seems like quite a lot for the reasonable price. It it easy to set up and take down and it all manages to pack up into a durable bag. We took it on a trip to see older brother over Thanksgiving and he REALLY wanted to borrow it. I told him I would buy HIM one for Christmas. We got a slightly different version.... it has a boom stand. He should receive it on Thursday. I LOVE shopping Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: White light too dim. Missing 2 of 5 clamps. 1 of the box light switch doesnt work. Contacted limo studio for support, amazon did the same thing and no respond..no product support. Update: they sent replacement parts and missing parts! Awesome! Product! Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Angelo R.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good enough for my home photo studio. Don’t know how well it would hold up with repeated setups/takedowns. Very nice quality on the backdrops and light boxes are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anne O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Frame quality was good, one lights didn't work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Frame quality was good, one lights didn't work out of the box, not a bulb issue.. Chroma-Key Backdrop isn't the property shade of green and wasn't big enough to stretch edge to edge on the frame.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Missing 12 things from order recieved.
customer_reviews.text: Right now I am posting only two stars because I received my order today, which I was very excited to get, only to open it and have half the products missing. Such things like: Contents: White Muslin Backdrop, 2 x Bulb Sockets Contents: 2 x Softbox Lighting Diffuser / 2 x White Umbrella Reflector / 5 x Backdrop Holder / That's 12 things!!! Not a happy camper right now! Hoping to have this resolved soon.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kit for low budget productions.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this item before i bought it, for it has some bad reviews, but i risked it and i couldn't be more glad. It's a simple, not too fancy kit but it gets the job done. Many people complained about the backdrops, saying the fabric was bad quality and it would spread dust all over, but mine turned out perfect. It's a great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great setup for the money
customer_reviews.text: Product is as you would expect, cheaply made, but I haven't found anything non-useable in the kit. The muslin backdrops are thin and have a lot of excess yarn hanging off of some of the seems. As long as you're not too rough with the backdrops, they're just fine I just wouldn't expect them to survive a washer or dryer. The stands are sturdy and seemingly well built. The carry bag is substantial and all the lights were working on delivery. It's great for a beginner setup.
customer_reviews.author: Pawz2142

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby!
customer_reviews.text: Set up was pretty easy although instructions weren't completely thorough they helped a lot with the visual pictures. Backgrounds however they aren't too thin and they aren't too thick. I put up the green background first and wasn't too happy on all the wrinkles and lines but I'm sure that it's nothing a good steamer can't fix! Everything that was included really helps to make the lighting and overall photo better than your average. I'm really pleased with the setup with the price and with the quality. it is my first day with it and my first day shooting with it so I haven't had any complications yet, but i know it should be durable equipment for future sessions!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Useless muslin included
customer_reviews.text: The backdrops that are included are essentially useless with this setup. They don’t go anywhere near the length of the frame. If you shorten the frame, it’s still too short. Shorten it one more time, and the fabric is too long. Not sure why you’d even include these in the set.
customer_reviews.author: BuildABrian

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s been good for the price, but some photos do have some noise in the image which may be cause by the quality of the lighting. Otherwise it’s good for photos but need a larger (wider) backdrop for video.
customer_reviews.author: Is1918

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit, Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kit based on the reviews, because there are few light kits out there in the same range. The backdrops seem to be a thicker, tougher material, everything comes in a pretty sturdy duffle bag. My kit was shipped missing two of the light bulbs. I contacted customer service and got a very quick reply, and had my missing light bulbs delivered in a couple days. The kit is great for my needs and I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Izabella

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: Had a bad first impression: Bulbs aren't as bright as I need them to be (they're so weak, I literally had one light inches away from the subject's face). The dimmer is a switch, so I can't adjust the brightness; the light is either on or off. I like that it includes all these items, but what good is a light kit, if the lights aren't bright enough to do a decent job?
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Tolentino

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner setup. Backgrounds perfect for a single or tight couples shot. Backgrounds are also NOT as long as they appear in the primary picture. Suggest buying something for the floor and some sand bags for the stands. One bulb has a rattling noise in it, but still works. Carrier bag handle ripped away the first lift. All in all it is still a good buy. just know it is just the beginning of many purchases......
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sekafetz

customer_reviews.title: Super Deal and Clean Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent starter set. The set up is extremely easy and the lights are perfect for a small studio. I was a bit concerned by other reviewers noting dust and "health hazards" . I had a vacuum at the ready when we unpacked this set; However the cloths that I got are sturdy, clean and do not have dust. I am thrilled with this steal of a purchase. I would buy again and recommend them to any new photog.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly @FreeHomeschooling101

customer_reviews.title: Great set, it includes a lot of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great set, it includes a lot of equipment. Its nice quality too, not cheap. Easy to setup, very self explanatory. Packaged very nicely, the light bulbs were very protected as was everything. It also comes with a bag which is also very nice and quality material. I definitely recommend! Great for a home studio.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a family Christmas party and everybody loved it. I am an amateur but the quality appears good to me. I'm sure there are heavier duty professional kits out there for more money but for my needs this is a great value. The only problem I had was one defective bulb which was happily replaced by the seller after they followed up to make sure that everything was okay with my purchase. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: vjm2011

customer_reviews.title: great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Had a little bit of an hiccup with one of the soft boxes not working upon arrival (the switch was defective), but they sent me a new one asap, great customer service. The box had some damage that it arrived in and on some the stands there were noticeable scuffs/scratches where some paint was missing, but I just used a sharpie to cover those. Otherwise, everything works great and the bag is very nice. Great deal and value.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Snap into your future
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my daughter as a graduation present. She is looking at becoming a freelance photographer. This is perfect for her. It gives her everything she needs. It is entry level. A great way to start out. The light boxes are a little 'cheaper" than what I would prefer but, for the overall price of the package what do you expect. This is a starter package.
customer_reviews.author: Christine (FairyTail Acres the Rescue)

customer_reviews.title: I wish I woulda opened it sooner and tested out and then sent it back for a refund and spent the money for a GOOD set.
customer_reviews.text: I knew it was gonna be CHEAP but the lights are so weak it really doesn't help much. Its only 45 watts after all. I wish I woulda opened it sooner and tested out and then sent it back for a refund and spent the money for a GOOD set. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value- very happy with my purchase. I'm not a professional, so this does the job!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall- does the job at a great value! In my opinion, you can tell it's not the high-quality, super expensive equipment, but it works just fine for me to take holiday/occasion pictures. I had contacted customer service as the lighting for the 2 soft boxes weren't working- by the next morning, I received a response with troubleshooting suggestions as well as the youtube link below. They said it was a common problem. Fortunately, their suggestions worked and all is well with the world again. Overall, very happy with my purchase! In case anyone has a similar issue- here's the link they provided to help demonstrate how to fix it. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great kit to have for photographers or filmmakers
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great kit to have for photographers or filmmakers. And it's at such a great price! I would recommend everyone to get this. Very beneficial to own and the service is great. Don't pass this up. It's a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca D.

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs and Backdrops are the limitations
customer_reviews.text: This product is reasonably priced, the bulbs did not work as expected, 2 of the bulb was cracked in the bottom and it needs to be wiggled few times to make it work, the bulbs are pricy, the backdrop is good for taking single portrait and it is very hard to take family portraits with the length and the width of the cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ebenezer

customer_reviews.title: Im very pleased with this set up for taking pictures of estate ...
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled to buy it. Everything is as it says it is. In regard to the black lint on the black background, I just put it in the dryer on a low heat with a clean wet kitchen cloth. Took it out and have not had any problems. Im very pleased with this set up for taking pictures of estate items to sell. Would definitely buy again. Customer service for this was above par too!!
customer_reviews.author: His4everchild

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner setup
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner setup! Covers all the angles, easy-to-assemble framework, and the fact they include four professional-grade photo light bulbs is a big plus. All in an easy to pack, easy to carry bag. I've already used mine in my home and taken it with me to a secondary location, and I've had no complaints. Definitely recommend for someone wanting to set up their first small studio.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Ross

customer_reviews.title: The backdrop is a little thicker than a bed sheet and seems to be sewn together pretty good. The reflective umbrellas are well made and ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time and well packaged. I've got to admit that the product well exceeded my expectations. We've only had it a short time and it is stationary in our Media Studio at my church.The backdrop is a little thicker than a bed sheet and seems to be sewn together pretty good. The reflective umbrellas are well made and are snug as they should be. You can't go wrong with this purchase. Thank you LimoStudio!
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Really great set. I’m not a photographer but thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great set. I’m not a photographer but thought it would be a lot of fun with all the family in for the holidays. The pictures are great! It took numerous try’s to figure out good positions for the lights, but it was fantastic once I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: A HG

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. The only thing is that the background doesn't go from one side post to the other so the clips that hold it in place are basically useless. Everything else seemed to be in good order. Bulbs might be replaced with something brighter but they worked great to get product shots in our low lit living room.
customer_reviews.author: Steph R

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I received this a few months ago while I was recovering from hand surgery. I finally got to use it a couple weeks ago and absolutely love it!!!! Every single item works as said and exceeds my expectations! My only 'complaint' is that it only comes with 3 clamps. Would have been easier with 4 but if that's the only 'bad' thing I can handle it!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Burleigh

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised, it would have been nice if the clothes were rolled so that they didn't contain creases but maybe I'm too fussy.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Broadbent

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily
customer_reviews.text: Love the set up. I use it daily. Now on zoom I have a virtual back ground, my video come out awesome for training. Great system to have for short money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned about the quality because the price so low, but it is working GREAT for me in professional use for filming and self-tapes! Assembly is easy and quality of the stands is solid. The backdrops can be hit and miss so I wasn't expecting a lot but the material is good. I need to be mobile with the setup so the bag is making me very happy for easy transport. Very happy with the Limophoto Video Light Kit!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Niccole

customer_reviews.title: The BOMB...... But....
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for people who want to start at the beginning level of video or photography. It comes with everything you need to get started. The only thing is that the lights are single not triple and the backdrops aren't big enough, so make sure you buy your on 10x20 backdrop so you can get your best use.. But other than that!! It's a great deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Malakhi RL Eason

customer_reviews.title: Filmed a music video with this thing
customer_reviews.text: This is great, even just to have for a rainy day. I already filmed a whole music video practically in green screen. Was really awesome and easy to use. I would suggest this to any movie maker/producer.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money..!
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially for a beginner photographer or for someone who wants to set up a home studio. It was easy to assemble, came in a well packaged box. Had to use all the lights to get the correct lighting, could have been a much better product with brighter day light bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: AK9999

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set up is super high quality and is so worth the money! Glad I bought it. Check the dimensions before you buy. It was a little bigger then I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cordell Meiburg

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, only one problem
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good deal, considering what you get for the price. Only downside is that the 3 backdrops are all smaller than the frame for holding them, so the clamps to make the curtain tight won't reach the curtain. I improvised by getting 2 bungee cords to lengthen the clamps on one side. The frame and lights are very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Masters

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners. Very easy to use also. Go checkout Afro Black on YouTube, he uses this for some of his skits. He's freaking hilarious also.
customer_reviews.author: Tastiie_ P.Y.E

customer_reviews.title: Decent set, quick setup but broken light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: The studio kit arrived on time and had everything in it. Set up was pretty simple and I was able to put everything together in about 20 minutes. The only disappointing thing is that two of the light bulbs turned on for a second and then popped. I realized they're ten dollars each! Contacted seller by email with the email address on a business card they put in the package but no response.
customer_reviews.author: Quan

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: Has a lot of what you need for great pictures. You will save $ instead of pay $100 a sitting at large chain stores. Keep in mind you need adequate room for setup and you should watch some YouTube tutorials on how to properly utilize the lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mo

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Better then expected!
customer_reviews.text: I run a marketing agency, and was in need of a set to use to film clients. This set was better than I thought it was going to be and the PRICE was amazing!! After I received the products, these people even reached out to make sure everything was as expected. Companies like this one are what makes Amazon so successful, and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Steffen

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is. Good quality for beginner.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this set a lot. It is absolutely great. I did have a problem with one broken lightbulb upon receiving. This was corrected super fast with an immediate email response and replacement. Reason for four stars is because there have been many complaining about one failed lightbulb, so it should be fixed by now.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisFree

customer_reviews.title: decently built and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it. Everything works well, decently built and easy to set up. I didn't have an issue with any powder or anything like that coming off the backdrops as some people mentioned. I didn't even wash them beforehand like some recommended. It's a great set up if you're a hobbiest.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mahal

customer_reviews.title: Great for an Amateur
customer_reviews.text: For an amateur this is great. There werent any instructions but was very easy to assemble. It was packaged perfectly with everything in its own packaging and a thumbs up to UPS for shipping. My only issue is pieces of thread seemingly slipping out from around the carrying case, but thats a small thing in my opinion. I would have loved the backdrops to accompany the width of the holder. The backdrops are thin ..so expect that. They may be washable, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Tremendous Value!
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away by the value of this product. It was easy to set up and had everything I needed to start using it right away (the light bulbs are included). The tripods are plenty sturdy and the light boxes pop open with ease. In the past, I have spent more on a single tripod than the total price of this kit. I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anita R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic items for the price but you really can't fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic items for the price but you really can't fit two people or a family into the backdrop. If one extends the backdrop material another 2 feet it is perfect. Every came in perfect condition and it was easy to put together once I had every laid out on the floor. There is no much in the instructions but it is all pretty simple to understand.
customer_reviews.author: TKTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick...for the darker skin definitely needs different lights...also needs trigger if needed for photography...you might as well buy a bag to keep this all in because the one this comes with broke quickly and did not fit everything not even close:/
customer_reviews.author: Airrionna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service along with a great product you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. VERY responsive to aminor product problem. Fixed it asap and stayed in touch with me the whole way until it was fixed. Great product too. Wife loves it and highly recommend product and company. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Jim Matthews

customer_reviews.title: A lot of great professional pieces for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Comes exactly how it looks. A lot of great professional pieces for a good price. It sets up just like a professional photography studio. Every item was sturdy and in good condition. Even the clamps aren't really an issue. Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Geneva's Closett

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner kit
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner kit. Had an initial issue with one of the parts but it was promptly replaced and everything works well. For the price you get a nice bit of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything works good but the lights are not made for the stands they come with. Otherwise it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough and quick to put together without instructions
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this product earlier in the day before writing this review. Easy enough and quick to put together without instructions. Sturdy enough to not break while taking apart or putting together. The screens are made with nice fabric, although could ask for more width on the screen. The clips work nice and do not move after placing them. The lights are easy to adjust and are very bright. This kit is a good choice for those starting out like myself and all around I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small sets
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully, unlike many of the reviews said, I did NOT have an issue with dust on the screens, everything was very clean and packed well. I DID, however, run into some of the connection issues with the lightbulbs; in some sockets, they do require a little fiddling with in order to hit a "sweet spot" it seems. I do wish the screens were a little wider as well, considering how wide the base is capable of being, but it fits my current uses perfectly for now (Not using it for large scenes or large group pictures, which would require a wider screen in my opinion)
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great starter unit
customer_reviews.text: This unit greatly enhanced my green screen video ability. The unit comes in a large soft side caring case. I did NOT encounter the green screen dust as referred to an eariler post. Great solid starter unit - you can add to it later with different backdrop.
customer_reviews.author: starleen2

customer_reviews.title: Works great for creating a green screen
customer_reviews.text: Works great for creating a green screen. The backdrops work best however when you use a different orientation not shown in the picture. What you get is good value for money. On the lighting kits for video They work better when you swap out the CFL bulbs for better LED bulbs. I am using philips 1500 lumens bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: PACE

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The things that come in here are of inferior quality.
customer_reviews.author: Haris Musanovic

customer_reviews.title: The studio is amazing! Super easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: The studio is amazing! Super easy to set up. I did wash all the backdrops before I put them up. Because I saw that in the other reviews. But when I put everything up the lighting the backdrop everything was perfect! I will definitely refer my friends to get this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything arrived pretty well except for two of the light bulbs ( ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived pretty well except for two of the light bulbs ( they wouldn't turn on and made a rattling sound ) Everything else worked fine but when putting up the green screen I started to get irritated in my throat, causing some coughs. Nothing serious but a little odd since I didn't smell any chemicals. The lights work great and I'm happy with the quality of the stands/fabrics.
customer_reviews.author: Azrick

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with the photo studio, especially for the price. It is perfect for someone like me who only needs it intermittently. It packs down into one carrying case for storage and is easy to assemble. I replaced the bulbs with better bulbs because fluorescent bulbs have terrible color rendering, but it was an overall nice purchase that I recommend for non-professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Racz

customer_reviews.title: Okay...
customer_reviews.text: When I was ordering yhis i was so excited because I am a YouTuber amd I desperately needed better lights but I couldnt spend a lot of money and ao I got this. Its not the best thing ever. The lights aren't bright enough. Everything is just really low quality BUT if you are a bigger its great to have. I both a ring light and I use these lights as a back up and the wrong great. It arrived on time and everything was in there. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, lights are great. Frame could be better.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this set! Broadcast awesome light during video shoots. I gave it 4 stars because the frame is too large for the curtain so you won't be able to get a really tight fit. (Unless you engineers a solution like we did) It's about a foot off.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky M.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice setup!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice setup for the money! The tripods are really decent not cheap looking at all! The screens are very nice good quality, idk what some ppl are complaining about theres no dust or smell on them! I really like this setup!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter lighting kit!
customer_reviews.text: This is an impressive starter lighting kit for budding photographers. Designed to be light weight but still offer sturdy platforms, the stands are solid. No need to over-tighten. Simple to operate. Looking forward to years of use.
customer_reviews.author: The Givenator

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for an "in home studio". I'm not a photographer by any means, I just bought to have fun taking pictures of my children. Its very user friendly and we have lots of fun using this. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

product_meta.title: LimoStudio Photo Shooting Kit with Background Support System & Umbrella Softbox Lighting Kit, Photo Video Studio, AGG1388
feature_bullets: Contents: 1 x Backdrop Stand and Cross Bar MAX 10 x 8.5 ft. / 1 x Green, Black, White 6 x 9 ft. Muslin / 4 x Light Stand Tripod / 4 x 45W CFL Light Bulb / 2 x Bulb Socket
2 x Softbox Lighting Diffuser / 2 x White Umbrella Reflector / 3 x Backdrop Support Clamp / 5 x Backdrop Holder / 1 x Heavy Duty Carry Bag
Full Package Photo/Video Lighting Studio Kit for both Professional and Amateur Photographers and Video Makers
Convenience-Focused Design Photo Studio Kit with Solid and Premium Quality Material Products
Creates Soft Evenly Spread Lighting Stream for Ideal Photo Shooting Condition

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars823 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
